Kini is a Cantonese teacher in Hong Kong, majoring in teaching Chinese as a foreign language. She has been teaching Cantonese teaching for 8 years, and the companies she has provided language training in Hong Kong including HSBC Payme team, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Industrial Bank, etc. She strives to make her lessons culturally enriching for students who come from different professions and cultural backgrounds and have little chance of using Cantonese. She enjoys preparing customized materials and lessons for her students.

address.en: Rm 05-06, 18/F Hollywood Plaza, 610 Nathan Road, Mongkok
